server_ola_alert_configuration_needed_sm: You will need to configure it manually via the IPMI KVM.
server_ola_alert_new_lacp_rule: OVHcloud will be updating its LACP aggregation model from 25 November 2025. Switching to or from OLA mode, or reconfiguring the aggregation, will activate the new behaviour. Check your operating systemâ€™s LACP and MAC settings, if necessary, to align with the latest update. You can find more information in this documentation.
